page.title: 10Home Life in PAUNTLEY
page.content:
{Meals} The day starts with a{Breakfast}of cereals, toast and tea/coffee.Few people eat an "English Breakfast" of bacon, eggs, sausages and toast. A light{mid-day meal}e.g.salad, fruit, or soup & bread, is usual. An{evening {meal}is roast meat & vegetables followed by fruit or pudding.{Snacks} are usually biscuits or potato crisps.
{"Foreign"}food eaten is usually curry, lasagne or chinese. However 33% of families never eat "Foreign" food.
{Restaurants}are the most popular places for dining out, followed by {Public Houses.}Few Families use{Self- {service restaurants}or use{"Takeaway" facilities.
